typeDescriptions.typeString: function (uint16,uint8,bytes memory,bytes memory,struct IStargateRouter.lzTxObj memory) view external returns (uint256,uint256)
function (uint16,uint8,bytes memory,bytes memory,struct IStargateRouter.lzTxObj memory) view external returns (uint256,uint256)
function (uint16,address,bytes memory,bool,bytes memory) view external returns (uint256,uint256)
function (uint16,uint8,bytes memory,bytes memory,struct IStargateRouter.lzTxObj memory) view external returns (uint256,uint256)

params._dstContract: The destination contract address on the remote chain
params._lzChainId: The LayerZero Chain ID (not the Zorro one)
params._payload: The byte encoded cross chain payload (use encodeXChainDepositPayload() below)

returns.nativeFee: Expected fee to pay for bridging/cross chain execution

params._homeChainZorroController: Address of the home chain Zorro controller (the destination contract)
params._lzChainId: The Layer Zero chain ID (NOT the Zorro chain ID)
params._payload: The bytes encoded payload to be sent to the home chain (result of encodeXChainDistributeEarningsPayload())

returns.nativeFee: Quantity of native token as fees

params._dstContract: The bytes encoded address of the destination contract (controller address on chain being repatriated to)
params._lzChainId: The chain ID on LayerZero (not the Zorro one) for the chain to which funds are being repatriated
params._payload: The bytes encoded payload to be sent to the destination chain (calculated from encodeXChainRepatriationPayload())

params._gasForDestinationLZReceive: How much additional gas to provide at destination contract
params._lzChainId: The LayerZero Chain ID (not the Zorro one)
params._payload: The bytes encoded withdrawal payload (calculated from encodeXChainWithdrawalPayload() below)

returns.nativeFee: Expected fee to pay for bridging/cross chain execution

params._destWallet: Optional wallet address on destination chain that will be receiving deposit. If not provided, will use a truncated address based on the _originWallet
params._originWallet: Wallet address on origin chain that will be depositing funds cross chain.
params._weeksCommitted: Number of weeks to commit deposit for in vault

params._amountUSDBuyback: Amount in USD to buy back
params._amountUSDRevShare: Amount in USD to rev share with ZOR staking vault
params._maxMarketMovement: factor to account for max market movement/slippage.
params._remoteChainId: Zorro chain ID of the chain making the distribution request

params._originChainId: Zorro chain ID of chain that funds shall be repatriated back to
params._originRecipient: Recipient on home chain that repatriated funds shall be sent to
params._pid: Pool ID on current chain that withdrawal came from
params._rewardsDue: ZOR rewards due to the recipient
params._trancheId: Tranche ID on current chain that withdrawal came from

params._originAccount: Account on origin chain that withdrawal request originated from
params._originChainId: Chain that withdrawal request originated from

params._payloadWithSig: ABI encoded payload with function selector

params._gasForDestinationLZReceive: How much additional gas to provide at destination contract

params._lzEndpoint: Address of LayerZero endpoint for this chain

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions anymore. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby removing any functionality that is only available to the owner.

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

checkXChainDepositFee(uint16,bytes,bytes.notice: Checks to see how much a cross chain deposit will cost

checkXChainDistributeEarningsFee(uint16,.notice: Checks to see how much a cross chain earnings distribution will cost

checkXChainWithdrawalFee(uint16,bytes,ui.notice: Checks to see how much a cross chain withdrawal will cost

encodeXChainDepositPayload(uint256,uint2.notice: Encodes payload for making cross chan deposit

encodeXChainDistributeEarningsPayload(ui.notice: Encodes payload for making cross chan earnings distribution request

encodeXChainRepatriationPayload(uint256,.notice: Encodes payload for making cross chain repatriation

encodeXChainWithdrawalPayload(uint256,by.notice: Encodes payload for making cross chan withdrawal

extractParamsPayload(bytes).notice: Removes function signature from ABI encoded payload

getLZAdapterParamsForWithdraw(uint256).notice: Encodes adapter params to provide more gas for destination
